result.eng: The first thing he reads is the sports page.
result.ga: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann sé
result.orig: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann sé
result.html: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann séThe first thing he reads is the sports page.
result.ponchtml: An leaṫanaċ spóirt an ċéad rud a léann séThe first thing he reads is the sports page.

result.eng: Healthy people have sport as an intergral part of their lives.
result.ga: Bíonn an spórt ina dhlúthchuid den saol ag daoine atá folláin

result.ponchtml: Bíonn an spórt ina ḋlúṫċuid den saol ag daoine atá folláinHealthy people have sport as an intergral part of their lives.

result.html: Is mór an spórt éIt's great fun.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an spórt éIt's great fun.

result.eng: Sport is more visible nowadays thanks to the media.
result.ga: Tá an spórt níos feiceálaí ar na saolta seo a bhuí leis na meáin

result.eng: Are you interested in sports programmes?
